message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I am interested in purchasing it, but I can only afford to pay up to $13,000. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,500?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I can only afford to pay up to $13,200. Would you be willing to consider this price?
